observation: I see a residence selection page with a dropdown for Country/region and multiple language selection modals overlaid. There's a dropdown showing 'Select' which needs to be clicked to choose a country/region. The Next button is disabled until a selection is made. Multiple language modal dialogs are open that need to be closed first.
reasoning: As a normal user trying to complete sign-up, I need to close these language modal dialogs that are blocking the main interface. I can see close buttons (×) for the modals. I should close them first before proceeding with country selection.
ux_issues: Multiple overlapping language modals are confusing and block the main interface
Language selection modals appear to be stuck open after previous interactions

outcome.visual_observation: The language modal overlay was successfully closed. The background changed from showing a person on stairs to displaying floating cryptocurrency/trading coins (Bitcoin, Apple, Dollar, etc.). The main content transitioned from 'Trading for anyone. Anywhere. Anytime.' to 'Trade Gold, Crypto, Forex, Oil, and more.' The sign-up form remained visible on the right side with the same residence selection interface.
